name: [Fn]+Words=True
description:
A 2D-puzzle-platformer where combining words together is key to get from A to B.

Movement: Left, Right = Arrowkey-left, right Up = Arrowkey-up Absorb/Release = Spacebar

This game was made for the 48 hrs GMTK GJ 2021: The theme of the jam was joined together, so after a hectic brainstorm we landed on the idea of joining words together to have real effects in the game.

Credits:

Programming - Donut53, Kess, Quete

Art - Dogus Kuner, Jiaqi, Irem Bettas

Design - zPika

Audio - Pellepropell
